name: Reserved Item
description: Candle holder and lace cover for Steve.

name: Gatsby Hat
description:
The Gatsby not only keeps you warm but helps you keep your look unique on those cold winter days, with a peak and button detail it's not like the usual wooly hat. Note -All buttons are now made of coconut in light woody brown to match the Button Scarves, if you would like a different button please let me know (I have a collection of buttons for re-cycling so it's no trouble)

Made using 100% vegan acrylic to give you a product with strength and durability, you can machine wash this hat, but hand washing will help it live even longer.

Available in the following colours:-
Black with an Ivory Band
Petrol Blue with an Ivory Band
Bottle Green with an Ivory Band
Plum with an Ivory Band 
Dark Grey with an Ivory Band 
Navy Blue with an Ivory Band

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Mittens With String
description:
Lovely cosy chunky mittens hand crocheted in an array of great colours.

These mittens are made with 100% vegan acrylic yarn and feature a string to go through your jacket sleeves so you never lose them.

All women love these, if you wear them you'd better be prepared for some adoring comments from strangers : )

You can machine wash them, but hand washing will help them and our planet live even longer.

Colours Available-
Black,
Chocolate Brown,
Navy Blue,
Petrol Blue, 
Dark Grey (in stock soon)
Bottle Green,
Wine Red,
Plum (in stock soon)
Mustard Yellow (in stock soon)
Olive Green.

Also Available in Organic Cotton-
Black 
Petrol Blue 
Plum
Teal
Dark Grey 
Mustard

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 WORLDWIDE, HOWEVER MUCH YOU BUY!

name: Button Scarves
description:
This is the most versatile scarf you will own, not only can you button up and loop it around your neck like a snood, but you can also unbutton the ends and use it as a regular wrap around long scarf, so soft and warm it'll be hard to take off this winter!

Made using 100% vegan acrylic yarn and accessorised with wooden buttons.

Available in a veritable sweet shop of colourways-
Black
Chocolate Brown
Wine Red
Plum
Petrol Blue - sold out, sorry.
Dark Grey - sold out, sorry.
Mustard Yellow
Bottle Green
Navy Blue -sold out, sorry.
and Olive Green

This is also available in a bunch of colours in Organic Cotton, check the shop for the item or order on this page from the scroll down choices.

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Organic Cotton 'Dip Dye' Mittens
description:
These cosy mittens are made from organic cotton, the half and half design is inspired by dip dying and rhubarb and custard boiled sweets!

Made with 100% Organic Cotton yarn in an array of colours that will brighten up your autumn/winter day.

We have a collection of hats, mittens and scarves that can be worn as a set, they bring a great pop of colour to your winter outfit.

The eka collection all comes gift wrapped, if you are giving this item make sure you write a 'gift note' and we will design a tag with your message to go with your wrapped item.

Made from:
100% Organic Cotton. You can machine wash these mittens, but hand washing will help them and our planet live even longer.

I've also got these in acrylic, I've listed the colour options in the choices box.

COTTON- Grey/Wine and Grey/Mustard are now sold out, sorry.

name: Hayworth Beret
description:
This slouchy beret is just perfect to keep you nice and warm during the cold winter months. The brim can be worn turned up or down, as you choose.

Made using 100% vegan acrylic yarn and can be machine washed though we advise hand washing for a longer life.

Colours Available-
Wine Red
Plum
Black
Dark Grey
Chocolate Brown
Navy Blue
Petrol Blue
Topaz Blue
Mustard Yellow
Bottle Green
Olive Green
and Bright Purple

Also Available in Organic Cotton-
please return to the shop page to find this option.

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Button Cowl Scarf
description:
Introducing the new Button Cowl, it's a little hibred of the oversized Button Scarf also available in the collection.

These handmade chunky knit cowls are great for slipping on to keep your neck warm this winter, they are small enough to wear inside a jacket collar but big enough to keep you truly warm and make a style statement at the same time.

Available in-
Black
Chocolate Brown
Petrol Blue
Wine Red
Plum
Bottle Green
Dark Grey
Navy Blue -sold out, sorry.
Mustard Yellow
and Olive Green

name: Deerstalker Hat
description:
The Deerstalker has earflaps buttoned up with coconut buttons to match the other items in the collection, these can be unbuttoned if you need some extra warmth about the back of your neck. There is also a peak detail at the front.

Available in the following colours-
Black
Chocolate Brown
Petrol Blue
Navy Blue
Bottle Green
Grey -currently sold out, sorry.


Made using 100% vegan acrylic to give you a product with strength and durability, you can machine wash this hat, but hand washing will help it live even longer.

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Cloche Hat With Buttons
description:
This 1920s inspired hat is so easy to wear, it has been a staple of the eka collection since 2005, this years take is using wooden/coconut buttons up one side, so it pairs perfectly with the button scarves also for sale in my shop.

Available in the following colours-

Black, 
Petrol Blue, 
Chocolate Brown, 
Bottle Green, 
Dark Grey,
Wine Red, 
Plum,
Olive Green,
and Navy Blue.

Made using 100% vegan acrylic to give you a product with strength and durability, you can machine wash this hat, but hand washing will help it live even longer.

These hats are stretchy and will fit most heads up to 58cm circumference. They are made to be 25cm along the bottom edge when laid flat on a surface. Each hat is handmade so sizes may vary slightly, but once you have worn them for a couple of days your hat molds to the shape you like it, the wonders if acrylic and crochet.

This style is also available in Organic Cotton on the shop page.

SHIPPING IS JUST £2 WORLDWIDE!

name: Watchcap -Acrylic
description:
Basic turned up beanie with an anchor patch.

Made using 100% vegan acrylic yarn and can be machine washed though we advise hand washing for a longer life.

They are stretchy and made to be about 25cm along the bottom edge when laid flat, If you have any concerns about the size let us know, we can look through stock to find one that would be hopefully perfect for you, everything is hand made so sizes vary slightly from hat to hat some are longer in length and good for larger heads.

Available in-
Black
Petrol Blue
Chocolate Brown
Wine Red
Bottle Green
Dark Grey
Navy Blue

We can make these to order in most of the other colours of the collection, so write a mail to us info@ekawear.com to let us know if you'd like one made for you in a different colour.

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Watchcap -Organic Cotton
description:
Beanie with a turn up and an anchor patch.

Made using 100% Organic Cotton and can be machine washed (seperately at first incase colour runs) though we advise hand washing for a longer life.

This hat is not only kind to the environment but also about as 'on trend' as it gets, the trendy folded up beanie inspired by Jack Nicholson's character in 'One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest' and even includes a nautical edge with it's anchor patch.

name: Cloche Hat -Organic Cotton
description:
These 1920's inspired hats are so easy to wear, they have been a staple of the eka collection since 2005, this years take is using wooden buttons up one side, so it pairs perfectly with the new button up scarves!

Made using 100% cotton yarn and can be machine washed at 30 degrees though we advise hand washing for a longer life, wash with like colours and dry on a flat surface.

 -the acrylic version of this hat is available in a bunch of other colours too, check the shop for that one.

Express the inner flapper in you with the cloche hat!

name: Button Scarf -Organic Cotton
description:
This is the most versatile scarf you will own, not only can you button up and loop it around your neck like a snood, but you can also unbutton the ends and use it as a regular wrap around long scarf, so soft and warm it'll be hard to take off this winter!

Made using 100% organic cotton.
Please hand wash or machine wash on a gentle cycle and dry on a flat surface to ensure a long life. Colour may run when washed so keep the water below 30 degrees.

These are nice and big measuring 29cm in width and almost 200cm along the longest side, they are hand made and stretchy so this size may vary slightly between items.

This item is also available in Acrylic, please go to the full store page to check that out.

name: Organic Cotton Hayworth Beret
description:
This slouchy beret is just perfect to keep you nice and warm during the cold winter months. The brim can be worn turned up or down, as you choose.

Made using 100% organic cotton and dyed using natural dyes. Please hand wash or machine wash on a gentle cycle and dry on a flat surface to ensure a long life. Colour may run when washed so keep the water below 30 degrees.

These hats are stretchy and will fit most heads up to 58cm circumference.They are made to be 25cm along the bottom edge when laid flat on a surface, the measurement from folded brim to the middle of the top is also 25cm. Each hat is hand made so sizes may vary slightly, but once you have worn them for a couple of days your hat molds to the shape you like it, the wonders if acrylic and crochet.

The eka collection all comes gift wrapped, if you are giving this item make sure you write a 'gift note' and we will design a tag with your message to go with your wrapped item.

name: Cotton Scarves
description:
Available from an array of 'ice cream shop' shades. So easy to wear, both inside and outside that you'll have a job to ever take it off!

The scarf is triangular shape and measures 170cm along the longest edge, each scarf is hand made so measurements may vary slightly from one item to the next.

100% cotton, the scarf can be machine washed, but hand washing is more gentle on the environment as well as them so we advise that.

Available in: Aqua, Red and Blue.

name: Bow Headband
description:
These headbands are surprisingly useful, not only do they look cute, they can be a great help on a 'bad hair day' when you simply can't get away with wearing a hat! The hair band can be used to hold back hair from the face and dress up an outfit making it look like you've spent hours putting effort into your look for the day, when in fact all you did was pop this little beauty on- if you don't tell then I won't either!

Made of acrylic yarn the bow measures approximately 22cmx 10cm and the plastic hair band is also covered in the same coloured yarn.

Available in Mustard Yellow, Light Grey, Teal, Plum and Black.

POSTAGE IS ONLY £2 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Tea Cosies -Owl, Cat and Fox
description:
These funny little guys'll keep your tea pot nice and warm for you at the same time as putting a smile on your face.

3 designs to choose from, the Owl, Cat or the Fox Character. 
All three are unique and will make a perfect gift to anyone you know that enjoys a nice pot of tea.

Measuring approximately (handmade so varies slightly from item to item)
20cm across x 25cm high (including ears/eyes)
These are stretchy so fit on the really big 'family' tea pots too.

Personalise yours- If you would like an embroidered message sewn on to your gift please let us know, we will sew your message onto a felt patch and then stitch it onto the back of your cosy for an added £5, please write to info@ekawear.com to arrange this.

name: Winter Animal Hanging Toys
description:
Handmade winter woodland animal hanging toys, from acrylic woolly creatures to bears made with organic cotton, there's a little menagerie to choose from!
These little creatures make a great addition to your Christmas tree or look great hanging from a door knob or drawer handle. They are perfect hanging on a pram or cot too.

Why not add on a personalised message to the person you're buying for? We will machine embroider a felt patch with your message then blanket stitch it onto your little animal so that your gift is truly personal and treasured (there is an added fee of £4 for this option, please write to us when you order to tell us you'd like this added). Choose your own message (please allow 5 days for us to process your order if you'd like personalisation)

These animals are all hand made and hand sewn so please allow for slight variations, although we make sure they all have a lovely happy expression.

name: Mug+Cosy with Matching Coaster
description:
The perfect gift for your tea lover.
Mug with a handmade jacket with button fastenings with a matching coaster. 
Coffee break never looked so cosy!

100% cotton, please handwash and dry on a flat surface to keep in shape.

If you would like a coaster in another of the colours than your jacket it's no problem, just let us know when you purchase.


POSTAGE IS ONLY £3 TO ANYWHERE WORLDWIDE!

name: Organic Cotton Gadget Cases
description:
''Eka's environmentally friendly accessories never looked so mouthwatering! this summers pastels offer a veritable sweetshop of options''

These little gadget cases are the perfect gift for someone wanting to keep their Phone, MP3 or Camera safe. Made using 100% Organic Cotton yarn, they can be machine washed but hand washing with protect the shell button and is kinder on the environment, so we advise that.

Small: Stretchy case measures 5cm x 10cm It is made with 100% Organic Cotton. Ideal for mp3 players and the smaller mobile phones or anything you want protect from scratches and minor bumps.

Large: Stretchy case measures 7cm x 12cm It is made with 100% Organic Cotton. Ideal for iPhones and anything you want protect from scratches and minor bumps like smart phones, mobile phones and cameras too.

Wide: Stretchy case measures 8cm x 11.5cm It is made with 100% Organic Cotton. Ideal for iPod Classics, or anything a bit wider than the iPhone that you want protect from scratches and minor bumps like mobile phones and cameras.

name: Gadget Cases -Small, Large and Wide
description:
Customer comment-
''Really lovely gadget case - fab colour and beautifully made. It's so nice to have something really personal and handmade in a world of generic, cheap leather ipod cases''

Small: Stretchy case measures 5cm x 10cm It is made with 100% acrylic. Ideal for mp3 players and the smaller mobile phones or anything you want protect from scratches and minor bumps.

Large: Stretchy case measures 7cm x 12cm It is made with 100% acrylic. Ideal for iPhones and anything you want protect from scratches and minor bumps like smart phones, mobile phones and cameras too.

Wide: Stretchy case measures 8cm x 11.5cm It is made with 100% acrylic. Ideal for iPod Classics, or anything a bit wider than the iPhone that you want protect from scratches and minor bumps like mobile phones and cameras.

Some items are sold out or need to be made to order see the scroll down menu of choices to see what's available in each size.
If you don't see your choice, let us know (via the contact page) and we'll make it to order for you.

SHIPPING ON THIS ITEM IS ONLY £1 WORLDWIDE!

name: Organic Cotton iPad and Kindle Cases
description:
A hand made, stretchy case, just perfect for protecting your iPad, Mini iPad or Kindle when traveling. Two sizes available to fit kindles and iPads.

The perfect little sleeve for your iPad. Hand stitched and finished to a very high standard.

The perfect gift for a family member that loves to read books on their kindle and needs a safe place for it while traveling or the person you know that goes nowhere without their iPad, these cases will ensure their hardware never gets scratched or damaged (within reason, dropping from a tall building excluded of course!)

Colour options-

Organic Cotton: Black, Indigo Blue, Aubergine, Wine Red, Teal, Grey, Light Yellow and Turquoise.

The larger iPad Case (20x26cm) has the buttons on the shorter edge, the smaller case (21x15cm) has the buttons on the longer edge. All buttons are made of coconut shell and have a 'wood' appearance.

They are made using 100% organic cotton.

Please hand wash your case and dry on a flat surface.

If you are buying this item as a gift, we offer gift wrapping for FREE with a note card that can be personalised with your own message.

name: Knitted iPad and Kindle Cases
description:
A hand made, stretchy case, just perfect for protecting your iPad, Mini iPad or Kindle when travelling.

Available in Acrylic and Organic Cotton

The perfect little sleeve for your iPad. Hand stitched and finished to a very high standard. These are made in the UK and sizes or colours can be requested when you order.

The perfect gift for a family member that loves to read books on their kindle and needs a safe place for it while travelling or the person you know that goes nowhere without their iPad, these cases will ensure their hardware never gets scratched or damaged (within reason, dropping from a tall building excluded of course!)

Colour options-

Acrylic: Black, Red, Plum, Topaz Blue, Olive Green (light green), Turquoise and Light Pink.

Organic Cotton: Black, Indigo Blue, Aubergine, Wine Red, Teal, Grey, Light Yellow and Turquoise.

The dimensions of these cases can be requested but the options I have here are the iPad and Kindle (and mini iPad) sizes, if you'd like to request a different size please write a 'note to seller' when you make your purchase and please allow 5 days for me to make a bespoke order.

The larger iPad Case (20x26cm) has the buttons on the shorter edge, the smaller case (15x21cm) has the buttons on the longer edge. All buttons are made of coconut shell and have a 'wood' appearance.

They are made using 100% vegan acrylic yarn and 100% organic cotton.

Please hand wash your case and dry on a flat surface.

If you are buying this item as a gift, we offer gift wrapping for FREE with a note card that can be personalised with your own message.

name: Organic Cotton Laptop Cases
description:
These handmade, lycra lined, stretchy cases are just perfect for protecting your laptop when travelling.

They are 100% Organic Cotton on the outer with a lycra lining. The buttons are made of shell.

Please hand wash your case and dry on a flat surface.

Made in two sizes Small (13inch or 33cm) and Large (15inch or 38cm) -please measure your laptop first if it is not an apple, computer not fruit!

Colours Available:
Turquoise
Violet
Wine Red
Yellow
Pink
Creamy Yellow
Black
Indigo Blue (not pictured)
(powder blue and mint green in middle image are sold out, sorry!)

name: Laptop Cases
description:
These handmade, lycra lined, stretchy cases are just perfect for protecting your laptop when traveling.

They are 100% vegan acrylic on the outer with a lycra lining.
The buttons are made of shell. 

Please hand wash your case and dry on a flat surface.

Made in two sizes Small-13inch and Large-15inch, catering for most laptop sizes (please measure your laptop first if it is not an apple, computer not fruit!)

Colours Available-
Black
Chocolate Brown
Khaki Green
Olive Green 
Turquoise 
White
Topaz Blue
Red 
Purple

SHIPPING ON THESE IS JUST £2 WORLDWIDE!

name: Stool Cover
description: This item is a hand made cover for the Marius Stool from IKEA -you need to buy your own stool from IKEA, they cost under £3.50 so it's an absolute bargain. The covers measure 34cm in diameter with a tighter edge to curl under the seat securing it in place. Created using acrylic yarn that can be machine or hand washed. The choices of colourway are endless, you can make a note when you buy to let me know if you'd like to choose your own colours. Here's a few choices I think look good with the different coloured stools (they come in White, Light Blue, Teal (called blue on ikea site) Light Pink and Black. White, Black and Grey. Light Blue, Cream and Grey (idea for White Stool) Teal, Light Blue and Cream (pictured on Teal Stool) Pink, Light Blue and Light Pink (pictured on Pink Stool) Black, Light Grey and Dark Grey (idea for Black Stool)

options.name: Pink, Light Pink and Light Blue
Black, Light Grey and Dark Grey
Other Choice of Colours (please make a note when you check out)

name: Cushions with Covers -Organic Cotton
description:
This large round cushion measures 45cm's and has a crocheted cover hand crafted from 100% organic cotton. The interior pad can be either feather or hollow fibre, your choice.

The two sides have slightly different patterns for a bit of variety, it's amazing how the smallest thing can make something feel fresh again.

There is a gap fastened by buttons from which the liner can be removed for cleaning, please hand wash covers and dry on a flat surface.

Each cushion cover has been hand crocheted and comes in 4 different colourways with a liner made of the filling of either Duck Feathers or man made filling.

The eka collection all comes gift wrapped, if you are giving this item make sure you write a 'gift note' and we will design a tag with your message to go with your wrapped item.

IF YOU WOULD LIKE ONE OF THESE WITHOUT AN INNER PAD, PLEASE WRITE TO REQUEST, you will get £5 off the price.

name: Round Cushions with Covers
description:
This large round cushion measures 18 inches and has a crocheted cover crafted from chunky acrylic yarn. The interior pad can be either feather or hollowfibre, your choice.

Each cushion cover is a one off and features two colours with the two sides differing from one another with varying bands of colour and pattern. There is a gap fastened by buttons from which the liner can be removed for cleaning, please hand wash covers and dry on a flat surface.

Each cushion cover has been hand crocheted and comes in 3 different colourways with a liner made of the filling of Duck Feathers (if you would like a foam liner please let me know when you make your purchase)

Available in the following colour options-
Pink and Cream
Teal and Cream
Light Purple and Cream

These colours are in stock but if you would like to place a one off order with your own choice of colours or one of the others pictured here please write to me to arrange -info'at'ekawear.com

IF YOU WOULD LIKE ONE OF THESE WITHOUT AN INNER PAD, PLEASE WRITE TO REQUEST, you will get £5 off the price and free postage.

name: Organic Shopper
description:
PLEASE CLICK THROUGH PICS TO SEE DESIGN OPTIONS.

36x41cm organic unbleached cotton shopper with shoulder length straps.

This shopper comes with the eka 'Wink' illustration on the front, the 'Portrait' designed for us by fashion illustrator Lottie Watson and our NEW RELEASE- the 'Wolf Cub' illustration by Genevieve Ryan.

Shipping on this item is FREE.
